item.title: Borderlands 4 Gameplay - 1 Hour, No Commentary
item.description:
Borderlands 4's launch is imminent! Take a look at the first hour of gameplay to get a feel for what the latest iteration of this legendary franchise has to offer.

Captured on an iBUYPOWER RDY Y70 TI B03.

item.title: Roblox: The Apocalypse Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
The Apocalypse is an amazing adventure that will challenge your survival skills. This Roblox experience allows you to collect many different resources and use them to craft new tools and structures. At nightg, hordes of zombies will attack you, and everything you build during the day will help you defeat them. Also, the game features coupons with free rewards, and in this guide, we will tell you about The Apocalypse codes.

All The Apocalypse Codes

Working The Apocalypse Codes

  • Money – Gives you x50 Credits.
  • TA_Release – Gives you x150 Credits.
  • Steve_The_Miner – Gives you the Starter Mining Kit, which contains a Stone Axe and a Stone Pickaxe.
  • PG – Gives you free rewards.

Expired The Apocalypse Codes

There are no expired The Apocalypse codes at the moment. If any of these coupons become unavailable, we will update this section and list them here.

The Apocalypse is a survival game, and any resource you can get there helps you survive longer. Promo codes can provide you with free Credits, which are the main currency in this experience. With their help, you will be able to upgrade your tools or purchase special kits that give you advanced items at the beginning of your playthrough. However, if they expire, the rewards will become unavailable, and we don’t recommend waiting too long before redeeming these codes.

How to Redeem The Apocalypse Codes

Codes in The Apocalypse are quite useful, and luckily, they are easy to use. The redemption process is very simple and requires you to click just a few buttons. Here’s a list of steps you need to follow to redeem The Apocalypse codes and claim your bonuses:

  • Launch The Apocalypse and wait for the game to load.
  • Once you’re in the lobby, click on the Kits button on the right side of your screen.
  • After that, find the line where you can type codes at the top of the shop. Enter the coupon you want to redeem.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New The Apocalypse Codes

The developers of this Roblox game may add new coupons in future updates, and if they do, we will include them in our article. Feel free to bookmark this guide and use it as a source of information about all the latest bonuses. Also, there’s the official The Apocalypse media that you can follow:

  • X Account
  • Discord Server
  • Roblox Group
Roblox
442
8.8 /10

September 1, 2006

item.title: Roblox: Guitar Simulator Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
There are lots of fun games that you can find on the Roblox platform, and Guitar Simulator is one of the most exciting ones. This experience allows you to train your character’s guitar skills and perform at concerts to earn rewards. Becoming a master musician takes a lot of time and resources, and the game allows you to get free rewards by activating coupons. Here we will tell you about Guitar Simulator codes and how to redeem them.

All Guitar Simulator Codes

Working Guitar Simulator Codes

  • thxfor750players – Gives you x150 Rubies and x3 Crimson Potions.
  • wizard – Gives you x150 Rubies and x1 Crimson Potion.
  • piramide – Gives you x150 Rubies and x1 Crimson Potion.
  • secret1 – Gives you x150 Rubies and x3 Lucky III Potions.
  • magic – Gives you x150 Rubies and x1 Lucky V Potion.
  • concert – Gives you x150 Rubies and x2 Crimson Potions.
  • snowy – Gives you x150 Rubies and x5 Notes II Potions.

Expired Guitar Simulator Codes

Currently, this Roblox experience doesn’t have expired codes. If any of these coupons becomes unavailable, we will update this section of the article.

Promo codes in Guitar Simulator can provide you with some decent bonuses, including Rubies and potions. The first ones are a very important currency that allows you to improve your character’s stats. As for potions, these are consumable items with different effects that can significantly speed up your progress.

How to Redeem Guitar Simulator Codes

Fortunately, redeeming Guitar Simulator codes is easy, and you can do it right away. The rewards you will get by activating these coupons are really valuable, and we recommend that you claim them as soon as possible. Follow these steps to redeem Guitar Simulator codes and obtain free bonuses:

  • Launch Guitar Simulator and wait for the game to load.
  • After that, click on the Store icon on the left side of the screen.
  • In the Store menu, click on the Codes button.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem in the menu that pops up.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Guitar Simulator Codes

The developer of Guitar Simulator may add new promo codes in the future, and we will try to keep this guide updated with all the latest bonuses. So, you can bookmark our article and check it for such updates from time to time. Also, there is the official media related to Guitar Simulator that you can follow:

  • Discord Server
Roblox

September 1, 2006

item.title: Roblox: Omni Battlegrounds Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Omni Battlegrounds is one of the representatives of the battleground genre, where you have to fight with other players for the title of the strongest. To do this, you have access to the abilities of characters from the Invincible series. And to speed up your progress, you can use Omni Battlegrounds codes.

These Roblox codes give players various rewards from the developers. Among them, you can find both boosters and consumables. It is worth noting that the validity period of each code is limited, so you should hurry to use them.

All Omni Battlegrounds Codes

Working Omni Battlegrounds Codes

There are no active codes in Omni Battlegrounds . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

Expired Omni Battlegrounds Codes

  • N0vember

As befits the genre, Omni Battlegrounds offers players a huge arena for battles. Every building in the city can be destroyed, which makes the battles even more spectacular. However, you have a long way to go to master skills. It is not enough to just spam attacks to win. Instead, you must use appropriate combos and movements. For this reason, it is quite difficult for beginners to win. Fortunately, the developers release various Omni Battlegrounds codes to encourage players.

These Roblox codes are a great source of free goodies, especially boosters and unique items. However, you can easily miss them due to their short validity. To avoid this, you must redeem the codes before they expire.

How to Redeem Omni Battlegrounds Codes

Using codes in Omni Battlegrounds is no different from most other Roblox experiences in this genre. You can earn rewards with just a few clicks. But for your convenience, you can follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch the Omni Battlegrounds experience.
  • Next, find a secluded place so you don't get beaten up. A good option is the top of a skyscraper.
  • Next, click on the gear icon at the top of the screen and select the Redeem Codes option.
  • After that, enter the code and click the Redeem button to get free goodies.

How to Get More Omni Battlegrounds Codes

If you want to get fresh Omni Battlegrounds codes as soon as they are released, you should bookmark this guide. We will update it over time, like our other Roblox articles. In addition, you can visit the official developer pages to get all the news first-hand:

  • DUCKWORTH Roblox group
  • Omni Battlegrounds Discord server

item.title: Best Games That Let You Become Famous
item.description:
There are a lot of games where players begin as an already famous character. Licensed-based games are a great example, like Marvel’s Spider-Man and the Batman Arkham games. It’s fun to inhabit the roles of superstar characters, but it’s equally fun to go from rags to riches throughout a campaign.

That’s how players can measure how far they’ve come. Some games play into becoming famous more than others, adding to the gameplay. Also, some characters become more infamous than famous in their campaigns, like in a Grand Theft Auto game. These examples best represent all forms of fame in games, and they’re waiting for players to dive in.

There will be some spoilers.

8 Brutal Legend

From Roadie To Rock God

Brutal Legend
Real-Time Strategy
Action
Systems
Released
October 13, 2009

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
m
Powered by

One of Double Fine’s better one-offs, Brutal Legend , starred a no-name roadie named Eddie who had no aspirations in life until he stumbled into a world of metal one day. Slowly, he assumed the role of a chosen one, destined to fight for all things metal.

Gameplay was a cross between a core action game and an RTS, as there are big battles. Brutal Legend ends with Eddie becoming more of a rock god than some lowly roadie, and even though there was never a sequel, the legend lives on thanks to backwards compatibility.

7 Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake

Becoming The Hero Erdrick

Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake
9.3 /10
Released
November 14, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ Due To Alcohol Reference, Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes
Powered by

Dragon Quest 3: Seeds of Salvation was a prequel to the original Erdrick trilogy on the NES. Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake is an HD-2D remake for modern consoles that expanded the story a bit and tweaked the gameplay.

Players start as a nameless hero who gathers a party and forms classes around them called Vocations. Most old-school RPGs find protagonists on a hero’s quest to become the most powerful warrior and save the world, which is what happens in this game. After defeating a dark lord, players are given the title Erdrick, whose descendant stars in the next game, which is quite the legacy.

6 Jeanne d'Arc

JRPG Joan Of Arc

Jeanne d'Arc
Tactical
Systems
Released
November 22, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T Due To Alcohol Reference, Fantasy Violence, Mild Language
Powered by

Jeanne d'Arc is a PSP tactical RPG by Level-5 that reworked the mythology surrounding the heroine Joan of Arc. She starts as Jeanne in this game and begins as a humble French farmer before demons, as part of the English army, attacked her village.

Thanks to powers from the gods, she can transform into a mythical knight during battle to turn the tide. Jeanne becomes famous throughout France, uniting her countrymen to defend their land from the demons and the English.

5 Like A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza In Hawaii

Luffy Would Be Jealous

Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii
7.3 /10
Released
February 21, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Blood, Intense Violence, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol
Powered by

Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii stars a renowned character in the Yakuza franchise, Goro Majima, but resets his status. Suffering from amnesia, Goro winds up on an island near Hawaii, thousands of miles away from his native land of Japan.

Through circumstances, power, and charisma, Majima quickly becomes a pirate captain and sails the Hawaiian islands in search of treasure. Players can build their reputation around Honolulu to recruit members for their pirate ship to create an even bigger name around Majima.

4 Marvel’s Avengers

Kamala’s Big Break

Marvel's Avengers Video Game
Beat 'Em Up
Fantasy
Systems
Released
September 4, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
T // Language, Mild Blood, Violence
Powered by

Players can assume the role of typical Marvel heroes in Marvel’s Avengers , like Captain America and Iron Man. However, the main campaign focuses on a fan girl, Kamala, who helps rebuild the Avengers who get scattered after a big incident.

Most of the game puts players in control of Kamala, who has a fun set of powers from stretchy hands that can act like swinging ropes to long legs good enough to pummel robots into scrap. By the end, she’ll become Ms. Marvel and rise into Marvel fame like she always dreamed.

3 Metaphor: ReFantazio

Become The King

Metaphor: ReFantazio
10 /10
38
8.9 /10
Released
October 11, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Blood, Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol, Violence
Powered by

Metaphor: ReFantazio is a game about politics, with the king dying quickly in the beginning. He returns as a flaming sun god, declaring a race of kings around the world. Whoever gathers the voice of the people deserves to be the new king, and anyone can try.

That’s where the protagonist, Will, comes into play, who is trying to get control of the throne for his Prince, who is in a diseased state. Through the main story's progress and side quests, players can build their reputation and get the will of the people behind them, and along the way, Will becomes an icon as well.

2 South Park: The Stick Of Truth

The New Kid Rises

South Park: The Stick of Truth
8 /10
7.4 /10
Released
March 4, 2014

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Mature Humor, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Violence
Powered by

South Park: The Stick of Truth had a clever premise for a South Park game that allowed players to create their own character. This “New Kid” becomes a chosen one in the fantasy RPG world that the kids of South Park are playing.

Even though players aren’t given a name by the end, they ascend as the most powerful kid in South Park, whom they all worship. Funnily enough, the sequel, South Park: The Fractured But Whole , resets the New Kid back down to a lowly peon.

1 Space Channel 5

From Reporter To Hero

Space Channel 5
7.0 /10
Released
June 4, 2000

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
e
Powered by

Space Channel 5 is something a little different as a music rhythm game from the Dreamcast era. Ulala is a reporter who is investigating a series of alien takeovers. Instead of battling them with action, Ulala dances to save citizens and get them to follow her.

This culminates in the final battle wherein Ulala loses, and it’s up to the rescued citizens to revive her with the power of music. It sounds silly and it is, but it’s also a powerful moment that shows the trust Ulala has gathered by the end.
